title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with large language models locally; the official CLI + Go library that pulls and runs GGUF models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript client for the Ollama HTTP API, published to npm as 'ollama'.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip-installable package that wraps the local REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: First-party LangChain integration letting you swap Ollama models into any chain or agent.

title: Ollama WebUI
summary: Feature-rich web interface for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-hass
summary: Home-Assistant custom component that exposes Ollama models as conversation agents.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Lightweight VS-Code extension bringing local LLM code completion via Ollama.

title: ollama.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin for chatting with Ollama models inside the editor and generating/refactoring code.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API with ActiveModel-style syntax.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin client library for Ollama offering sync/async APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive terminal dashboard for Ollama (model list, chat, logs, resource monitor).

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) plus docker-compose examples for quick local/cloud setup.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module provisioning Ollama on AWS EC2 GPU instances with CloudWatch and IAM.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 community SDK providing strongly-typed HttpClient wrapper and Blazor sample.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for talking to Ollama, enabling on-device chat apps across iOS/Android.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate using reqwest to expose typed endpoints and SSE streaming for Ollama.

title: Ollama Reddit Community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, troubleshooting, and showcasing Ollama-powered projects.

title: Ollama on Hacker News
summary: Discussion thread comparing Ollama to llama.cpp and local LLM deployment strategies.

title: Ollama YouTube Walkthrough
summary: 15-minute tutorial covering installation, pulling models, and integrating with LangChain.
